Class SettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.settings.SettingsManager

  • public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all TigerText settings.

      • modifyUserSettings

        public void modifyUserSettings(java.util.Map<SettingType,java.lang.Object> modifiedSettings,
                               @Nullable
                               GenericAPICallStatusListener listener)
        Modifies a subset of account settings from Settings for the current user
        Parameters:
        modifiedSettings - A Map containing SettingType settings to sync with the server and locally
        listener - An optional listener to be notified whether the call succeeds or fails

        public void syncUserSettings(java.lang.String orgId,
                             RequestListener listener)
        Deprecated. Please use modifyUserSettings(Map, GenericAPICallStatusListener) to modify account settings in Settings
        Syncs user settings and updates server settings with the current local overrides.
